title: Sion Splash Art
body: Can anybody tell me the artist behind Sion's splash art? I was planning on using it for something, and would like to have a name to include in the citation.

replies.body: The artist behind a lot of it is Josh Smith, although I don't believe he posts here. He has also worked on Braum and Twitch's splashes.

Welp, I just discovered he worked on Kha'Zix's splash art, one of my favorites. Also on Dunkmaster Darius. I'll leave this lil' gallery I found here, part of his work on League of Legends at 1920x1080+ resolution:

https://www.artstation.com/artist/lokken

By the way, you guys should be releasing all of this awesome pieces of art on your Patch Notes and VU posts. Soetimes you find a 1920.jpg in the link only to find it downsized and compressed -- some exceptions can be found though, like Galactic Azir.
